com.akvelon.server.service.api

Interface Service<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of object ID (primary key).
    V - type of domain object.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CultureService, ProductCategoryService, ProductModelService, ProductReviewService, ProductService, ProductSubcategoryService, UnitMeasureService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CultureServiceImpl, ProductCategoryServiceImpl, ProductModelServiceImpl, ProductReviewServiceImpl, ProductServiceImpl, ProductSubcategoryServiceImpl, SuperService, SuperStringService, UnitMeasureServiceImpl

    public interface Service<K,V>
    Standard services operations with domain objects through DAO objects. The user of this interface can create, read, update, delete domain objects from the database through DAO objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      K create(V value)
      Create domain object in database table through DAO object.
      void delete(K key)
      Delete domain object of type V from the database through DAO object.
      java.util.List<V> getAll()
      Reads all objects of type V from the database through DAO object.
      Dao<K,V> getRepository()
      Return DAO object for domain object of type V.
      V read(K key)
      Read domain object of type V from the database through DAO object.
      <T> java.util.List<V> readAllBy(java.lang.String fieldName, T value)
      Reads all objects of type V from the database, which contains a value of type T in the field "fieldName".
      <T> V readBy(java.lang.String fieldName, T value)
      Read the domain object of type V, which contains a value of type T in the field "fieldName".
      void update(V value)
      Update domain object of type V in database tables through DAO object.

      • readBy

        <T> V readBy(java.lang.String fieldName,
             T value)
        Read the domain object of type V, which contains a value of type T in the field "fieldName".
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of sought value.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - field for search.
        value - sought value.
        Returns:
        read value.

      • readAllBy

        <T> java.util.List<V> readAllBy(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                T value)
        Reads all objects of type V from the database, which contains a value of type T in the field "fieldName".

        value - sought value.
